column1: * 1956 - Dan Wickenden gives a positive review of The Return of the King in the New York Herald Tribune titled "Notable Allegorical Trilogy Comes to Triumphant End".

column2: who would provide the voice of Thranduil in The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth II

column1: * 1968 - The first day of filming J.R.R. Tolkien for the documentary Tolkien in Oxford.
* 2004 - Andy Serkis wins an http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Empire_Awards Empire Award in the category Best British Actor
column2: for his role as Gollum in The Lord of the Rings (film series).
